CHAT.comment: JEAN MARC NKEN, Petitioner v. MARK R. FILIP, ACTING ATTORNEY GENERAL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 1:00 p.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LINDSAY C. HARRISON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF LINDSAY C. HARRISON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 2:02 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
